entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • "Encapsulate field" throws an error when field with uppercase name is declared in class with primary constructor #75210
  • Collection expressions can avoid additional local when constructing a `List<T>` of fixed size #75208

Closed

  • Editing Roslyn.sln in VSCode crashes with frequent stack overflows #75155
  • Unexpected value `QueryClause` of type `Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.BoundKind` #75194
    17.12
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35322.09 #75206

PullRequests

Created

  • Use manual recursion for binary patterns #75212
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • docs: fix C# 13 proposal link #75207
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Field-backed properties: definite assignment #75116
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Ignore irrelevant exceptions when reporting LSP server NFW #75150
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2543568 #75195
    auto-merge
  • VisitCollectionBuilderCollectionExpression - Ensure target of a spread element is rewritten. #75201
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, Next

Updated

  • EnC: allow changing accessibility of members #75191
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode
  • SynthesizedHotReloadExceptionSymbol #74625
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode, 17.12
  • Updates content exclusion for on-the-fly-docs #75172
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Async rename commit #74794
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage
  • Fix symbol info in identifier name in object initializer #74582
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Consider `params` and default values when inferring unique method signature #71380
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, New Language Feature - Default lambda parameters
  • Enable support for an LSP client to open source generated files #75180
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Optimise allocations in `AssertEx.NormalizeWhitespace` and `OperationTreeVerifier.Verify` #75202
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.13
  • Use MSBuild globs to determine which file changes are relevant #75139
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix null dereference in GetAssemblyReferenceAlias #75094
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove LittleEndian asserts #75159
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Skip tests on Mono #75160
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
